Text: Hi, can you recommend some fascinating Japanese TV shows?
Alright, a Japanese TV show from what period?
A Japanese TV show from the 2010s.
What kind of Japanese TV shows do you normally like to watch?
I prefer suspenseful TV shows, do you have anything for me?
Ok, maybe Quartet is a good choice.
When did it premiere?
It premiered on January 17, 2017.
How about its Douban rating?
Its Douban rating is 9.1.
Who directed it?
It is directed by Nobuhiro Doi.
Thanks, could you recommend an Indian movie?
Ok, what kind of Indian movies do you normally like to watch?
I love Indian movies starring Shatrughan Sinha.
Well, then I recommend Khoon Bhari Maang.
How about its Douban rating?
Its Douban rating is 8.0.
How about its runtime?
It is 172 minutes.
Ok, thank you for your patience, bye,
You are welcome. Hope you enjoy my recommendations.
Hi, my friends are coming to visit me. Are there any scenic areas near Gusu District that are not that expensive?
Alright, if you want to hang out with your friends, Humble Administrator's Garden is a nice place. It is a traditional Suzhou-style garden and also near to your home.
Good, where is it?
The Humble Administrator's Garden is at No. 178, Dongbei Street, Gusu District, Suzhou City.
How about its rating online?
Let me have a look. This scenic area has a rating of 4.5, for your reference.
Ok, we may spend the whole day together, can you recommend some a bit more expensive restaurants near here?
Well, Banyuan Private Home Cuisine is a good choice. It is a bit more expensive and serves Jiangsu Zhejiang Cuisine with local features.
Ok, can you check the address and phone number of it? Is it near a subway station?
The restaurant is at No. 3, Chuanfang Alley, North of Pingjiang Road. The phone number is 139-6217-0368. There is no direct subway line to it.
Well, are there any other transportation options? Can you recommend some?
You can take other public transportation or drive there, both are convenient.
Ok, thanks for your patient service, see you.
You are welcome. Phone me any time you need help, goodbye.
Hello, I want to buy a gas-powered SUV, can you recommend one within 150,000 yuan?
Well, Volkswagen T-Cross with a 1.5 L petrol engine will suit your needs.
Does it have cruise control?
Sure, it has.
How about the reverse camera?
Sorry, this model does not have this function.
Does it have ventilated seats?
Sorry, this model also does not have this function.
Got it. Thanks, bye.
My pleasure. I'm glad to be at your service, goodbye.

Hi, how's it going? My friend will come to Suzhou to visit me and I want to find a bit more expensive restaurant where I could take him. It would be nice if it is near Suzhou Industrial Park. Do you have any recommendations?
Ok, here I recommend Haidilao Hot Pot. It is a nice choice.
Good, we love hot pot. What is its phone number?
Got it. Can you help me check the opening hours?
No problems. It is open from Monday to Sunday, 09:00-07:00.
Wow, it is open all night, then we can stay a bit longer. Could you find a not that expensive hotel with standard rooms?
Womu Boutique Hotel would be a good choice.
Ok, how about its rating? My friend prefers high-rated hotels.
It does have a high rating of 4.7. Your friend will be pleased about it.
Indeed, he will love it. By the way, does it have a parking lot?
Yes, it has a free parking lot.
Perfect, thank you for your warm advice.
Sure, any other questions?
No, thank you again, bye.
Ok, bye.
We will take a trip to Suzhou as the first destination of our graduation trip. Could you recommend some hotels in Suzhou New District?
New City Grand Rezen Hotel may be a good choice.
I prefer a bit more expensive hotels, thanks.
Then this is the one you want, it is a bit more expensive.
How about the price of one room in this hotel?
It is 919 yuan.
Good, what is the phone number?
Alright, it is 0512-68182888.
Could you recommend some popular landscape scenic spots in this district?
I'd recommend Tianping Mountain Scenic Area.
How about the ticket of this scenic area? How much is it?
The ticket is 30 yuan.
Ok, can you tell me its phone number?
Could you perhaps help me find a nice hot pot restaurant around here?
Sichuan Xiang Tian Xia Hot Pot is the one that meets your needs.
Thank you for your help, bye!
My pleasure, goodbye.
Hi, my child doesn't feel well and I want to take her to a pediatric clinic. Which general hospital has a good pediatric clinic?
Hello, you can go to Suzhou Kowloon Hospital for a good pediatric clinic.
What's the phone number of this hospital? I need to call in advance for inquiries.
The phone number of this hospital is 62629999.
How about the address?
It is at No. 118, Wansheng Street.
By the way, does it have a CT scan?
Yes, it has a CT scan.
If I go there by bus, which bus should I take?
You can take bus No. 2, No. 47, No. 106, No. 206, No. 215, No. 258, No. 6, No. 108, No. 110, No. 116, or No. 166 bus.
Got it, thank you so much. Bye.
My pleasure, goodbye.
Hi, I just arrived in Suzhou for my trip. Can you help me find a 4-star hotel in Changshu?
In Changshu, Atour Hotel in Changjiang Road is suitable for you.
How much is a king-size room?
It is 312 yuan.
I know that Mudu Town is quite famous in Suzhou. Can you tell me its opening hours?
It is usually open 08:30-17:00.
How much is the ticket? Is it free?
Yes, it is free.
I also want to try some good food. I heard Laotianqiao Frog Hot Pot is nice, so does it have a high rating?
Its rating is 4.6.
Any recommendations for what to order at this restaurant?
Of course, you need to try their bullfrogs.
Thank you, bye.
My pleasure, goodbye.
I will come to Xiamen next week for work but am still not sure which day I will set out, it depends on the weather. Could you help me check the wind force and direction for next Sunday?
Ok, it will be northeast force 2 next Sunday in Xiamen.
Well, it seems that the wind will not be that strong. How about the weather in Xiamen that day?
It will be sunny.
And the temperature? Will it be hot?
It will be mild. The maximum temperature will be 22 degrees Celsius, and the minimum temperature will be 14 degrees Celsius.
Nice. How about next Thursday in Xiamen. Maybe I will go that day.
Well, it will be sunny next Thursday in Xiamen too.
Great. How about the temperature? Is that similar to that of next Sunday?
Almost. The maximum temperature will be 20 degrees Celsius, and the minimum temperature will be 12 degrees Celsius.
Ok, I got it. I will check the schedule with my boss. Thanks a lot, bye.
That's ok, goodbye.
Hi, I just came to Suzhou for work, I'm only here for a short time and I want to go and do something. Are there any not that expensive Suzhou-style gardens I could go to for a short visit?
How about Master of the Nets Garden? It is a famous fine garden with traditional opera performances at night.
It sounds great. Where is it?
It is at No. 11, Kuojiatou Alley, Daichengqiao Road, Gusu District. Maybe you can take a taxi here if you cannot find it.
Well, I want to take the subway. Is there a direct subway line to the Master of the Nets Garden?
Sorry, there are no direct subway lines to the Master of the Nets Garden.
Ok, fine. By the way, I want to have some moderately priced South Korean food near the Garden.
Here is the Seoul South Korean Cuisine and it has a high rating online.
Well, it sounds like the cuisine there is authentic. How about the average cost?
It is about 81 yuan per person, the price is fair as you required.
Sure, that's not too high. That's what I want. Where is the restaurant?
It is on the Lifeng Plaza 1F, No. 399, Baodaidong Road. It should be easy to find because it is in a business district.
Ok, I will find it when I get there. Thank you for your advice, bye!
Happy to help, bye bye!

Hi, I'm a local in Suzhou but I'm not quite familiar with places for fun in local areas. My friend is coming to visit me in Suzhou. I plan to take him to an amusement park. Can you recommend a bit more expensive one?
Suzhou Amusement Land Forest and Water World is a good choice for you. You will have a good time here.
Is there anything special to see there?
Suzhou Amusement Land Forest and Water World's amusement facilities are forest-themed. It is like being in a vast forest close to the ocean.
Can I get there directly by subway?
I am afraid you cannot. There are no direct subway lines to it.
Okay. How about the tickets, how much are they?
It is 198 yuan.
Ok, I see. Thanks. Goodbye.
That's all right, have a good time here, bye.
Hi, my friend will come to see me in Suzhou and I hope to find an affordable place near where I live. It would be good if it's near Suzhou Industrial Park.
Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University is a good place.
What is the contact number?
The number is 0512-88161071.
Is there anything special to see there?
It is a university jointly established by Xi'an Jiaotong University and the University of Liverpool.
Well, do you have some moderately priced restaurants to recommend near it?
You could try Xibei Restaurant.
What it's phone number?
The phone number is 400-8207320.
How about its opening hours?
It is open from Monday to Sunday, 10:30-21:30.
Thank you.
My pleasure.
Goodbye.
Goodbye.

Hello, I have decided to travel to Suzhou and it's the first stop on my graduation trip. So, I hope to know more about the city before I arrive. Can you recommend a bit more expensive hotel in Wujiang District?
Hi, welcome to Suzhou. Shui'an Hanshe Boutique is a nice hotel where you could enjoy a nice sleep.
What is the contact number of the hotel and how much are their rooms?
The contact number is 180-5181-5602. A standard room is 789 yuan and a king-size room is 629 yuan.
Okay, I got it. Which water town is the most popular one near the hotel?
It must be Tongli Town. I believe you will find it very beautiful.
So, how about its rating and opening hours?
It is open from 07:30 to 17:30 and its rating 4.5.
Okay. I want to find a restaurant serving Japanese cuisine near, any recommendations?
Alright, Niutanjia Ben'Ge Charcoal Barbecue serves good Japanese cuisine.
Wow, thank you so much. Now I have got a plan for my accommodation and what to eat. Haha, I will come to you if I have other questions, see you!
Ok, hope to get your call, see you!
Hello, my family and I are traveling to Suzhou and we want to visit some cheap attractions near Suzhou Industrial Park. Do you have any recommendations?
Dushu Lake Church would be a very good choice.
It sounds like it must be very special, right?

Yes, it has many interesting features. Dushu Lake Church is located by the beautiful Dushu Lake in Suzhou Industrial Park and that's where the spot gets its name. Plus, the church was built in the Gothic architectural style.
I like the Gothic architectural style very much. Is there any subway station near this attraction?
I’m sorry, there is no subway station nearby.
Well, it seems we can’t take the subway there. We want to find a restaurant nearby for dinner and my family loves Northwestern cuisine. Do you know any you could recommend?
Sure. Then Xibei Restaurant is a good choice for your family.
That's great, all of us like wheaten food. Could you please check its rating?
Okay, its rating is 4.6.
That's pretty good. Is there a subway station nearby?
Yes, there is a direct subway there.
Great, then we can take the subway. By the way, I have to trouble you to find us a nearby 3-star hotel after dinner. We want a king-size room, do you know any good place?
Then the only choice is Womu Boutique Hotel. It is perfect for you.
Okay, then we will stay there. Is the hotel's rating high?
Its rating is quite high, 4.7.
Well, I'm happy with that. What's its phone number?
OK, got it. Thanks a lot. Goodbye.
My pleasure, goodbye.
Hello, I'm going on a business trip next week. Please help me check the flights from Hangzhou to Shenzhen next Friday, preferably in economy class.
You can take flight HU7394 of Hainan Airlines from Terminal 3 of Hangzhou International Airport to Terminal 3 of Shenzhen Baoan International Airport.
I hate when flights are late. What's the punctuality rate of this flight?
The punctuality rate is 91.29%.
I want my friend to pick me up, what time will the flight arrive?
It will arrive at 13:30 that day.
How about the departure time of the flight?
It takes off at 11:15 that day.
Please help me check the UV intensity in Shenzhen next Friday.
The UV intensity will be moderate.
Any wind?
It will be east force 2.
Will it be cold? What about the temperature?
The maximum temperature will be 21 degrees Celsius, and the minimum temperature will be 15 degrees Celsius.
Ok, thanks a lot for answering all my questions. Bye.
Goodbye.
Hi, my family and I just came to Suzhou for a trip. We are staying in Suzhou Industrial Park. Can you help me find a South Korean restaurant? The price does not matter.
Ok, QingHeGu is a good choice for you.
Good, where is it? How about its opening hours?
It is in No. 21 Building, Li Gongdi Phase 3. It is open 11:30-21:00, Monday to Sunday.
Is there a phone number?
The phone number is 0512-67635689.
OK, got it. Thanks, goodbye!
You're welcome. Hope you and your family have a good time, bye!
Hi, I've had a lot of free time recently and want to watch some movies and TV shows. Can you recommend a romantic movie from Taiwan, China?
There are many movies of this kind. What period do you prefer?
One from the 2000s.
From this period, I would recommend Secret.
Who's starring in this film? What about its runtime?
Members of the cast include Jay Chou, Gwei Lun-mei, Anthony Wong Chau Sang and Su Mingming. It is 101 minutes.
When did it premiere?
It premiered on July 27, 2007, in Taiwan and on July 31 of the same year on the Chinese mainland.
Thanks. By the way, I want to watch a science fiction TV show from Taiwan, China, do you have any recommendations?
There are not many choices, but I would like to recommend On Children for you.
How many episodes does it have? What about the leading cast?
It has 10 episodes and stars Ko Su-Yun, Liu Zi-Chuan, Tseng Shao-Zong and Ling Hsin-Yu.
What's its Douban rating?
Its Douban rating is 8.4, pretty good.
Ok, thanks for your recommendation, bye!
My pleasure, goodbye!
I will travel to Beijing at such short notice but I'm not sure when. Could you help me check the weather in Beijing?
When do you expect to go there? If let me know when I can help you.
Please check the weather for Friday. I want to know the weather next Friday.
It will be cloudy and later sunny next Friday in Beijing.
Will the sun be strong? How about the UV intensity?
The UV intensity will be high, so please prepare sun protection.
How about the wind force and direction? If it's windy, I will put on more clothes to keep warm.
It will be northwest force 3-4, you better be careful.
Please help me check the weather for next Wednesday.
It will be sunny and then cloudy next Wednesday in Beijing.
And the temperature? How many degrees?
The maximum temperature will be 8 degrees Celsius, and the minimum temperature will be −5 degrees Celsius. It will be cold, so please keep yourself warm.
Ok, thanks. I will confirm the schedule of my trip later, bye.
That's all right, goodbye!
Hello, how much is the ticket for Xishan Island Scenic Area?
45 yuan.
Is it a fun place to visit? Does it have a high rating?
It's got a rating of 4.4 and it is a nice place for sightseeing.
I heard that the directly-operated Chongqing De Zhuang Hot Pot has nice hot pots and how about its rating?
It's got a rating of 4.5, which is quite high, you can give it a try.
Ok, so where is it?
It is at No. S3015, 3F of Wanbao Plaza, Songling Town.
Alright, got it. Thank you so much, bye.
That's ok.

Hello! I'm from out-of-town and here in Suzhou on a trip with my family! We're staying in Wuzhong District and I want to find a restaurant where we can have some delicious Northwest cuisine. The price does not matter. Could you recommend a restaurant?
Ok, I recommend you go to Yangguanguren Restaurant.
Fine, any recommendations at this restaurant? Where is it?
I recommend fried mutton with shallot. The restaurant is on the 3F floor, just beside the lift of CR Vanguard, No. 128, Jiuhua Road.
Is there a direct subway to it? It would be great if there was!
Sorry, there is no direct subway.
That's too bad! Thanks for your help anyway, bye!
My pleasure, goodbye.
Hello, I'm looking for a cheaper scenic area, preferably a water town. Any recommendations?
You could go to Mudu Town. It's not too expensive.
Ok, how about its rating?
It's got a rating of 4.4.
Anything special to see there?
The key feature of it is the garden. You can visit classical gardens such as Yanjia Garden, go on a boat ride and enjoy the flowing water.
Great, I'm looking forward to it. And please help me find a moderately priced resort hotel. I want a king-size room.
I would recommend Jinling Nanlin Hotel. It has very good service.
Do you have to pay for parking there?
The parking lot is free.
Ok, could you tell me its address?
It is at No. 20, Gunxiufang, Shiquan Street, Gusu District, Suzhou.
Ok. No further questions. Thanks for your service. Bye!
You're welcome. Have a nice day!
Hi, I get bored staying home on weekends and I'm looking for a nice TV show. Could you recommend an American science fiction TV show from the 2010s?
No problem. I recommend the first season of Westworld.
How about the runtime for each episode? Does it have a high Douban rating?
Its Douban rating is 8.9 and each episode runs for 60 minutes.
And who's the director?
The director is Jonathan Nolan.
Ok. Thanks a lot, bye!
My pleasure, goodbye!
Hi, I'm Suzhou but I'm from out-of-town. I'm looking for a nice restaurant serving Jiangsu-Zhejiang cuisine in Suzhou New District.
In this area, I would recommend Dream of Taoyuan, it meets your needs.
How about its opening hours?
It's open 10:00-21:30, Monday to Sunday.
Does it have a high rating?
It's got a quite high rating of 4.5.
I want to find a 5-star hotel nearby.
New City Grand Rezen Hotel may be a good choice.
And I prefer a king-size room.
It does have king-size rooms.
What's the phone number of this hotel?
Its phone number is 0512-68182888.
How about its address?
It is located on No. 1, Shishan Road, Suzhou New District, Suzhou.
Thank you, bye.
Not at all, bye.
Hi, I'm in Suzhou with my friends and I heard that Suzhou Marriott Hotel Taihu Lake is a pretty good hotel. Does it have king-size rooms?
Sure, it has king-size rooms.
Good, where is the hotel? Do you know its phone number? I will call it later.
The hotel is at No. 6, Shuli Road, Suzhou Taihu National Tourism Vacation Zone, Wuzhong District, Suzhou. Here is the phone number, it's 0512-65693333.
Ok, got it. By the way, is there a parking lot there?
Yes, it has a free parking lot.
Nice. Thank you for your information, bye!
My pleasure, goodbye!
Hi, I'm looking for a hot pot restaurant in Suzhou Industrial Park. Can you recommend one for me?
Haidilao Hot Pot is a good choice.
What's the average spend?
It's 127 yuan per person.
Can you tell me the exact address, please?
It is on 4F of Saige Digital Plaza, No. 318, Suya Road.
Any recommendations for this restaurant?
It's recommended you give the tomato pot a try.
Thanks for your service. Goodbye!
You're welcome!
Hello, I've heard that Beijiang Restaurant in Suzhou is good. Could you help me check the average spend per person?
It is 67 yuan per person.
How about its opening hours?
It's usually open 10:00-22:00, Monday to Sunday.
What are its recommended dishes?
Xinjiang Big Plate Chicken.
Thanks a lot for your considerate services, bye.
It's my pleasure.
Hello, I want to buy a 14-inch lightweight laptop from Lenovo, preferably with a memory capacity of 8GB.
Hi, I recommend Lenovo 7000 Xiaoxin Chao.
How much is it?
The Lenovo Xiaoxin Chao 7000 is 4,999 yuan.
What's its standby time?
The standby time of this laptop is over 9 hours.
How about its performance when playing games?
It has an entry-level performance for playing games.
Thank you, I will think it over.
My pleasure. I'm glad to be at your service.
Hi, I'm spending my holiday at home, and I want to watch a movie from Taiwan, China. Wu Kang-Ren is my favorite actor, is there a movie starring him? Please recommend me a movie.
Ok. I recommend The Bride. He's starring in it, I think you will like it.
When did the movie premiere?
It premiered on August 20, 2015, in Taiwan, China.
Who else is starring in it? How long is the movie?
In addition to the main actor Wu Kang-Ren, Hsieh Hsin-Ying, Tanaka Chie and Yen Cheng-Lan are also in it. It is 89 minutes.
Well, could you help me find a movie starring Ko Chen-Tung?
Sure. I recommend You Are the Apple of My Eye.
What's its Douban rating?
Its Douban rating is 9.1. That's a very high rating.
Ok, thank you for your recommendations, I'll come to you if I have other questions. Bye!
Anytime, goodbye!
Hi, I'm a local in Suzhou and my friend is coming to see me. I plan to take him to a scenic area, maybe a water town. I'd prefer a cheaper one, do you have any recommendations?
You can take your friend to Mudu Town.
Ok, is there anything special to see there? I want to know a bit more about it so I could tell him, haha.
It is a water town featuring gardens. You can visit classical gardens such as Yanjia Garden, go on a boat ride and enjoy the flowing water.
Ok. Can I get there directly by subway?
No.
Alright, I will drive here. How much is the ticket?
It is free, you don't need to buy a ticket.
Ok. Great! Thanks for your service. Goodbye!
You're welcome. Have a nice day!
I will take a trip to Suzhou soon, could you recommend a 3-star hotel in Changshu, Suzhou? I want a standard room.
I recommend Vienna Hotel.
How about its rating?
It's got a rating of 4.8.
Well, that's good. How about the phone number? And how much are their rooms?
The phone number is 0512-52018188 and the room rate is 340 yuan.
Got it. Thanks, bye.
Happy to help, bye!
I'm looking for a movie, could you recommend a Chinese mainland comedy from the 2010s?
I recommend Dying to Survive.
How about its Douban rating?
Its Douban rating is 9.0.
Who stars in it?
This movie stars Xu Zheng.
Ok, how about its runtime?
It is 117 minutes.
I also want to watch a TV show. Could you recommend a feature drama from the Chinese mainland?
Journey to the West is a good choice and it's got the highest rating.
What's its Douban rating?
Its Douban rating is 9.6.
Well, that's pretty high. Who's the main actor?
Liu Xiao Ling Tong is the main actor.
How many episodes does it have?
It has 25 episodes.
Ok. Thank you for your recommendation, bye!
My pleasure, goodbye!
I'm coming to Suzhou for a trip. First, I hope to find a suitable place for a date in Suzhou New District. Could you recommend one?
I would recommend Suzhou Amusement Land Forest and Water World. It is a nice place.
And can I get there directly by subway?
Sorry, it is in a remote area and there is no direct subway to it.
Anything special about this place?
Its amusement facilities are forest-themed. It is like being in a vast forest close to the ocean.
I'm also looking for a 5-star hotel in this area. Could you help me find a suitable one?
New City Grand Rezen Hotel is a good choice. It is a pretty good hotel.
By the way, I'd prefer a standard room, does it have standard rooms?
Sure, it does.
How much is a standard room? I guess it's expensive in a 5-star hotel, right?
Yes, it is 1,019 yuan, quite costly.
Well, I can afford it. How about its phone number?
Alright, the phone number is 0512-68182888.
Thanks for your help, bye!
You're welcome, goodbye.
Hi, I love watching TV shows, especially Japanese ones. Could you recommend a crime drama with a high rating?
Ok, I would like to recommend Legal High. It's a popular crime drama and I'm sure you will love it.
Who are the leading actors? How many episodes does it have?
The main actors are Sakai Masato, Aragaki Yui and Namase Katsuhisa. It has 11 episodes.
When did it premiere?
It premiered on April 17, 2012, in Japan.
Good, I'm also looking for a feature drama. Could you recommend one for me?
Ok. I would recommend a feature drama called Unnatural. It is quite popular in recent years. I'm sure you will like it.
What's its Douban rating?
Its Douban rating is 9.4. That's a very high rating.
Great, thanks for the recommendations, I'll come to you if I have other questions. Bye!
You're welcome. Anytime, goodbye!
I will go on a business trip next week. Can you help me check if there are any high-speed trains to Xiamen next week?
From where will you depart?
Shanghai.
When will you leave?
I plan to leave next Wednesday morning.
Do you have any seat preferences?
I prefer first class.
Ok, then I would recommend G1653, from Shanghai Hongqiao to Xiamenbei.
What's the departure time?
The departure time is 08:15 that day. It's early in the morning so you need to get there early.
What about the arrival time? I will get somebody to pick me up.
The arrival time is 13:31 that day.
How much is the ticket? I need to let my company know in advance.
The ticket is 773.5 yuan. Well, it's not that expensive.
So, how about the weather in Xiamen next Wednesday?
It will be sunny and good weather.
Sunny? Perfect. How about the temperature?
The maximum temperature will be 17 degrees Celsius, and the minimum temperature will be 9 degrees Celsius. Quite hot.
All right, thanks for the information, bye.
My pleasure, goodbye.
Because of work, I'll go on business to Wuzhong District, Suzhou. Can you recommend a cheaper hotel nearby?
Ok, I would recommend Chengyi Lianhao Hotel. It is a nice hotel.
Does it have standard rooms?
Yes, almost every hotel has standard rooms.
Where is the hotel?
The hotel is opposite the bus station at No. 67, Guangjian Road, Wuzhong District, Suzhou.
Can you tell me the phone number of their front desk?
The phone number of the front desk is 0512-67079995.
What's the room rate?
It is 168 yuan.
Good. Thanks, bye.
Not at all, bye.
Hi, I will fly to my company's headquarters next Saturday. Can you help me check if there are any flights from Xiamen to Beijing next Saturday?
Sure. You could take flight CZ5036 of China Southern Airlines, from Terminal 3 of Gaoqi International Airport to Terminal 2 of Beijing Capital International Airport.
Ok, I want to travel in first class, are there any seats left? I enjoy a quiet environment.
Yes, there are still many tickets left.
Great, could you tell me the departure and arrival times? I want to plan in advance.
The specific departure time is 11:00 that day and it arrives in Beijing at 14:00 that day.
Got it. How about the punctuality of the flight? I don't want to wait.
The punctuality of this flight is 100%.
Good. And how will the weather be in Beijing next Saturday? We will have an outdoor dinner party.
It will be sunny in Beijing next Saturday.
Ok. Will there be strong winds?
It will be that strong, north force 3.
Well, how about the UV intensity? We young girls don't want to get tanned.
The UV intensity will be quite strong.
Okay, thank you so much for the help, bye!
No problem, it was nice to talk to you.
Hi, we are going to Suzhou as the first stop on our graduation trip. Are there any expensive hotels in Suzhou Industrial Park? Could you recommend one?
Alright, I would recommend Jinji Lake Shilla Hotel.
Where is it? How's its rating?
It's got a rating of 4.6 and it is located at the Modern Leisure Plaza, Wangdun Road, Suzhou Industrial Park, Suzhou.
Got it. Could you recommend the most popular landscape scenic spots in this district?
Ok, I would recommend Jinji Lake Scenic Area.
What about its rating? And the opening hours?
It's got a rating of 4.5 and it's open all day.
Great. Could you recommend some restaurants or shops with nice bread and desserts in the area?
Ok, LELECHA may fit your needs.
Got it. Thanks, bye!
My pleasure, goodbye!
Hello, my child is in sixth grade. Could you recommend a tutorial class for me?
Which subject's do you want your child to study?
I plan to sign my child up for an English tutorial class. My child's English is not great and I hope a teacher can help.
What day do you prefer for the tutorial class? And which time?
It would be best to have the class on Saturday afternoon. My child is free then and I also have time to take my child to and from school.
Ok, I would recommend PE6T48010. It is a good tutorial class.
Great, how about the schedule of this tutorial class? And how many sessions are there?
It has 6 sessions, with a total of 12 teaching hours.
When does each class dismiss? I need to arrive there in advance to pick up my child.
The class is dismissed at 17:40, please remember to get there early to pick up your child.
Oh, I almost forgot to ask, how much is it?
It is 960 yuan, that's a decent price.
